name: Ohio Chess
description:
Welcome to Ohio Chess! If you've been living under a rock and don't know what chess is, chess is board game invented over around 1500 years ago. since then, there hasn't been a single update. Can you believe it? I don't understand how one grinds a game made by careless develeopers who doesn't even take feedbacks. And I'm here to fix that - I have added numerious new pieces to chess as well as game modes. And you thought Avatar took long enough for a sequel? May this be the official chess 2 after 15 centuries.

CREDITS:

engine - scratch (nerd_emoji)

programming - me

art - me (with inspirations from fairy chess pieces)

idea - me and whoever made chess

music - swag in Ohio

supporting this game - you
